name: The Village (itch) (HeleneVitting)
description:
The village is a choose your own adventure game where you play as a woman who travels to an old-fashioned village in hope of bettering her mental state.

Made as an entry to ECTOCOMP 2019

Cover image by Luigi Manga on Unsplash

Content warnings (spoilers):

  • Anxiety
  • Depression
  • Murder
